con:testCase.name: TC803_AddNewTenant_BadPropertyValue
con:testCase.con:description: Test Case in Testlink ---------------------- T-803:Tenant cannot be added if properties have bad values

con:configuration.content: Unable to add tenant - key is invalid due to: key cannot exceed 20 characters
Unable to add tenant - key is invalid due to: key can only contain the following characters: letters, numbers, underscores
Unable to add tenant - key is invalid due to: key can only contain the following characters: letters, numbers, underscores
Cannot save tenant - : name is invalid due to the following: name must be less than 256 characters

con:config.script: log.info " :: Test Case * " + testRunner.testCase.name + " * has been executed with no errors :: "

con:property.con:name: name_invalid
con:property.con:value: "Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. Tenants name must not exceed 256 characters. "

con:testCase.name: TC805_BadValuesForKeysOnRequests
con:testCase.con:description: Test Case in Testlink ---------------------- T-805: Valid error messages when running /tenants requests that have an invalid value for the tenant key Valid error message on "Get Tenants" response when key has an invalid value

con:testCase.name: TC60_DeploymentNotDeletedIfAssignedToTenantOrRoute
con:testCase.con:description: Test Case in Testlink ---------------------- T-60:Deployment cannot be deleted if it is assigned to a tenant or a route

con:testCase.name: TC808_TenantThatHasAssignmentsCannotBeDeleted
con:testCase.con:description: Test Case in Testlink ---------------------- T-808:A tenant that has assignments cannot be deleted

con:configuration.token: Cannot delete tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} because of the following assignments: application assignment count: 1 deployment assignment count: 1
Cannot delete tenant ${#TestCase#tenantKey} because of the following assignments: application assignment count: 1

con:config.script: log.info " :: Test Case * " + testRunner.testCase.name + " * has been executed with no errors :: "

con:testCase.name: TC930_TokenRegeneratedAfterChangeOnRouteOrTenant
con:testCase.con:description:
T-930: Tenant Token is regenerated after a change is made on the associated route or tenant
Create a route. Get tenant token. Modify route --> change the deployment. Get tenant token. Verify token reflects the change made on deployment.

con:config.script: log.info " :: Test Case * " + testRunner.testCase.name + " * has been executed with no errors :: "

con:testCase.con:description:
RMINF-122 Increase Size Of Tenant Key
T-931: Tenant key can have up to 20 characters

int currentPageNumber = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("currentPageNumber")) + 1
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("currentPageNumber", Integer.toString(currentPageNumber))
log.info " Current Page Number: " + currentPageNumber
